name: Search_Flights

fromId.description: From/Departure location Id. fromId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

toId.description: To/Arrival location Id. toId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

departDate.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

stops.description:
Filters flights based on the number of stops. Accepted values are:
none for no preference (returns flights with any number of stops)
0 for non-stop flights
1 for one-stop flights
2 for two-stop flights
If provided, the value must be either none, 0, 1, or 2.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

fromId.description: From/Departure location Id. fromId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

toId.description: To/Arrival location Id. toId can be retrieved from api/v1/flights/searchDestination(Search Flight Location) endpoint in Flights collection as id.

departDate.description:
Departure or travel date.
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

stops.description:
Filters flights based on the number of stops. Accepted values are:
none for no preference (returns flights with any number of stops)
0 for non-stop flights
1 for one-stop flights
2 for two-stop flights
If provided, the value must be either none, 0, 1, or 2.

adults.description: The number of guests who are 18 years of age or older. The default value is set to 1.

children.description:
The number of children, including infants, who are under 18.
Example:
Child 1 Age = 8 months
Child 2 Age = 1 year
Child 3 Age = 17 years
Here is what the request parameter would look like:
children_age: 0,1,17

sort.description: This parameter orders result by BEST, CHEAPEST or FASTEST flights.

cabinClass.description: Search for flights that match the cabin class specified. Cabin call can be either ECONOMY, PREMIUM_ECONOMY, BUSINESS or FIRST.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

response_summary:
There are a total of 203 flight options available for your journey, with the cheapest fare starting at $67.71 (rounded to $68). The flights vary in terms of stops, with 51 non-stop options, 195 one-stop options, and 203 two-stop options, all with similar minimum prices around $68. The airlines operating these flights include Air India (115 flights, starting at $71.10), IndiGo (55 flights, starting at $67.71), and Etihad Airways (23 flights, starting at $336.36).  

Departure times are spread throughout the day, with flights available from early morning (00:35) until late evening (23:45). Arrival times are also distributed across different time blocks, with 43 flights arriving between midnight and 5:59 AM, 53 between 6:00 AM and 11:59 AM, and 48 between noon and 5:59 PM.  

Most flights include baggage allowances, with 195 offering cabin baggage and 170 providing checked baggage. The flight durations range from 2 to 30 hours, with the fastest option being a non-stop flight.  

Three highlighted flight deals are available: the cheapest at $67.71, the fastest at $67.74, and the best overall at $67.74, all rounded to $68. These flights are operated by IndiGo and include checked baggage (33.1 lbs) and cabin baggage (15.4 lbs with size restrictions).  

The search criteria focus on economy class, and baggage policies for the airlines are provided for reference. Personalization segments suggest these options may suit frugal travelers, short-haul trips, or family travelers. Unfortunately, price alerts are not eligible for this search.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers seeking flight options between specified locations. It searches flights based on departure and arrival IDs, with filtering options for stops, cabin class, and sorting by best, cheapest, or fastest. The response includes detailed flight information such as price, duration, airline, baggage allowance, and departure/arrival times. Location IDs must be obtained from the SearchDestination API.

enhanced_parameters.fromId: Unique identifier for the departure airport/location.
enhanced_parameters.toId: Unique identifier for the arrival airport/location.
enhanced_parameters.departDate: Date of departure for the flight.
enhanced_parameters.returnDate: Date of return for round-trip flights.
enhanced_parameters.stops: Filters flights by number of stops (non-stop, one-stop, etc.).
enhanced_parameters.pageNo: Pagination number for browsing flight results.
enhanced_parameters.sort: Sorts flights by best, cheapest, or fastest options.
enhanced_parameters.cabinClass: Filters flights by cabin class (economy, business, etc.).

totalCount.description: Total number of flight options available for the journey.

filteredTotalCount.description: Total number of flight options after applying filters (if any).

stops.description: List of flight options categorized by the number of stops.

ar_items.description: Details of flights with a specific number of stops.

numberOfStops.description: Number of stops for the flight category (e.g., 0 for non-stop).

count.description: Number of flights available with this number of stops.

minPrice.description: Minimum price for flights in this category.

units.description: Whole number part of the price.

nanos.description: Fractional part of the price in nanoseconds.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the fare in nanoseconds (e.g., 740000000 for $0.74).

items.description: An empty array indicating no further nested items.

addedItems.description: An empty array indicating no additional items are included in the fare.

token.description: A unique identifier or token for the API response, likely used for session tracking or subsequent API calls.

priceDisplayRequirements.description: An array that may contain requirements or conditions for displaying prices, currently empty in this response.

ar_items.description: Individual price display requirement or condition.

pointOfSale.description: Indicates the region or country where the sale is being made, in this case 'us' for the United States.

tripType.description: Specifies the type of trip, here 'ONEWAY' indicating a one-way flight.

appliedDiscounts.description: An array that would list any discounts applied to the flight options, currently empty in this response.

ar_items.description: An object representing a discount applied to a flight option.

offerKeyToHighlight.description: A key or identifier for a specific flight offer that should be highlighted, possibly the best or cheapest option.

extraProductDisplayRequirements.description: An object that may contain additional requirements or conditions for displaying extra products or services, currently empty in this response.

key.description: Identifier for the type of flight deal (e.g., CHEAPEST, FASTEST, BEST).

offerToken.description: A unique token representing the flight offer, used for booking or further queries.

price.description: Detailed breakdown of the flight price.

currencyCode.description: The currency in which the price is displayed (e.g., USD).

units.description: The whole number part of the price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the price, represented in nanoseconds (e.g., 710000000 for $0.71).

priceRounded.description: The rounded price of the flight for display purposes.

currencyCode.description: The currency in which the rounded price is displayed (e.g., USD).

units.description: The whole number part of the rounded price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the rounded price, typically zero.

travellerPrices.description: List of prices broken down by traveller type (e.g., ADULT, CHILD).

ar_items.description: Price breakdown for a specific traveller.

travellerPriceBreakdown.description: Detailed breakdown of the price components for the traveller.

currencyCode.description: The currency of the total price.

units.description: The whole number part of the total price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the total price.

baseFare.description: The base fare component of the total price.

currencyCode.description: The currency of the base fare.

units.description: The whole number part of the base fare.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the base fare.

fee.description: Additional fees applied to the fare.

currencyCode.description: The currency of the fee.

units.description: The whole number part of the fee.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the fee.

currencyCode.description: The currency of the tax.

units.description: The whole number part of the tax.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the tax.

totalRounded.description: The rounded total price for display purposes.

currencyCode.description: The currency of the rounded total price.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the rounded total price, typically zero.

units.description: The whole number part of the rounded total price.

discount.description: Discount applied to the fare, if any.

currencyCode.description: The currency of the discount.

units.description: The whole number part of the discount.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the discount.

totalWithoutDiscount.description: Total price before any discounts are applied.

currencyCode.description: The currency of the total price before discount.

units.description: The whole number part of the total price before discount.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the total price before discount.

totalWithoutDiscountRounded.description: The rounded total price before any discounts, for display purposes.

currencyCode.description: The currency of the rounded total price before discount.

nanos.description: The fractional part of the rounded total price before discount, typically zero.

units.description: The whole number part of the rounded total price before discount.

travellerReference.description: Reference identifier for the traveller (e.g., '1' for the first traveller).

brandedFaresShownByDefault.description: Indicates whether branded fares are displayed by default in the search results.

directFlightsOnlyFilterIgnored.description: Specifies if the 'direct flights only' filter was ignored in the search criteria.

hideFlexiblePricesBanner.description: Determines whether the flexible prices banner is hidden in the search results.

cabinClass.description: The class of the cabin for the flight options, indicating the travel class (e.g., Economy, Business, First). In this case, all flights are in Economy class.

code.description: The IATA airline code representing the airline.

name.description: The full name of the airline.

url.description: A URL linking to the airline's baggage policy page for reference.

FRUGAL_COMPANIONS.description: An array of strings representing the types of travelers or travel companions that the flight options may be suitable for. In this case, it suggests that the flights are suitable for frugal travelers.

ar_items.description: A string indicating a type of traveler or travel companion.

isEligible.description: Indicates whether the user is eligible for price alerts or other personalized features for this flight search.

isSearchEligible.description: Indicates whether the search criteria meet the eligibility requirements for the API to return flight options.

isBlockoutEligible.description: Indicates whether the search is eligible to be blocked out or restricted based on certain conditions (e.g., blackout dates, restricted routes).

atolProtectedStatus.description: Indicates the ATOL protection status for the flight booking. 'NONE' suggests no ATOL protection is applicable for this search.

searchId.description: A unique identifier for the search session, used to track or reference this specific flight search query.

banners.description: An array that would typically contain promotional or informational banners related to the flight search. Currently empty in this response.

ar_items.description: Expected to contain banner information, but empty in this instance.

isOffersCabinClassExtended.description: Indicates whether the search results include extended cabin class options. 'false' means no extended cabin classes are included in the offers.

cabinClassExtension.description: An object that would contain details about any extended cabin class options. Currently empty, indicating no extensions are available for this search.
